title: Bug 2529 - Open/Close project not always available in Navigator
description: When selecting both P1 and P2 in the Navigator, the option to open/close the project is sometimes not available. This issue can be observed when using 1GFKW5S.
OB: The option to open/close the project is not consistently available when both P1 and P2 are selected in the Navigator.
EB: The option to open/close the project should always be available when both P1 and P2 are selected in the Navigator.
SR:
1. Open the Navigator.
2. Select both P1 and P2.
3. Verify if the option to open/close the project is available.
4. Repeat the above steps multiple times to see if the issue occurs intermittently.
